featured.text: New Zealanders have given it the nickname , which is a native Maori word meaning “god of bad looks.”

definition.zh_def: 暱稱，通常用於親密或非正式的場合，代替正式姓名的稱呼。
definition.en_def: A familiar or informal name given to a person instead of their real name.
definition.example: Her nickname is 'Sunny' because she always brightens up the room.
